name: 007 Legends: Skyfall DLC
summary: Take on the role of James Bond as played by Daniel Craig in all new SKYFALL levels. Unlock three new single player levels following the storyline of the SKYFALL movie. Levels take place in Istanbul and Shanghai as the player (Bond) attempts to track down the villain Patrice.

esrb.synopsis: This is a first-person shooter in which players assume the role of James Bond as he relives missions from classic Bond films. As players pursue international criminals/terrorists, they engage in missions that involve gathering intelligence, planting explosives, and commandeering armed vehicles. Bond uses pistols, machine guns, sniper rifles, and rocket launchers to kill enemies and destroy targets; some attacks are accompanied by slow-motion effects. Players can also use stealth takedowns (e.g., knocking characters out, slamming their heads against objects) to defeat enemies from behind. Red blood splashes appear when enemies are shot, and brief on-screen blood effects occur when Bond takes damage. In one mission, there are references to drugs and cocaine (e.g., “. . . [W]e're not just small time drug dealers anymore . . . From the poppy fields of Afghanistan, to the cocaine processing facilities in Columbia . . .”). A handful of scenes contain suggestive imagery (e.g., a gold-painted woman in a bikini lying face-down on a bed; ice sculptures of female angels embracing in a suggestive pose); two female characters have somewhat suggestive names (e.g., P*ssy Galore and Dr. Goodhead). The words “a*s,” “damn,” and “hell” can be heard in the dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 16 years and over only.
It contains: Realistic looking violence
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
